@graph.name: Adraki Gobi aloo (cauliflower potato stirfried with ginger) - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: Adraki Gobi aloo is a tasty dish full of flavor. Cauliflower and potato is stir fried with ginger for an easy meal. Serve with naan or roti

itemListElement.name: Adraki Gobi aloo (cauliflower potato stirfried with ginger)

@graph.name: Adraki Gobi aloo (cauliflower potato stirfried with ginger)
@graph.description: Adraki Gobi aloo is a tasty dish full of flavor. Cauliflower and potato is stir fried with ginger for an easy meal. Serve with naan or roti
recipeIngredient: 2  medium white potatoes chopped into small cubes
1  Serrano chili pepper or to taste
2 inch ginger chopped (use less if you dont like ginger)

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan, add oil and heat it at medium heat for 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pan, add oil and heat it at medium heat for 2 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in cumin seeds and wait until they start sputtering.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in cumin seeds and wait until they start sputtering.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the asafetida(hing), coriander powder and turmeric and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the asafetida(hing), coriander powder and turmeric and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the chopped ginger, garlic and serrano pepper and let them cook for 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the chopped ginger, garlic and serrano pepper and let them cook for 5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the potatoes chopped into small pieces and mix well and cook for 5-7 minutes stirring occasionally.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the potatoes chopped into small pieces and mix well and cook for 5-7 minutes stirring occasionally.

recipeInstructions.text: Break the cauliflower into florets and chop some of the bigger florets to form smaller pieces.
recipeInstructions.name: Break the cauliflower into florets and chop some of the bigger florets to form smaller pieces.

recipeInstructions.text: Add in the cauliflower florets and salt and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add in the cauliflower florets and salt and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Reduce the heat to low and cook covered for 15-20 minutes stirring every 4-5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Reduce the heat to low and cook covered for 15-20 minutes stirring every 4-5 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Potatoes should be soft when done.
recipeInstructions.name: Potatoes should be soft when done.

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with cilantro leaves and serve hot with rotis or Naan.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with cilantro leaves and serve hot with rotis or Naan.

@graph.keywords: cauliflower, easy recipe, vegan main course
